TopicTitle: The KSP 1.0 Grand Discussion Thread: Conquering Space Was Never This Easy!

Articles.Content: I think I have a way around. Go to Wayback Machine and go to the site from there.

> 
> Well, this is great... I forgot my thumbdrive at home... No point in downloading. Besides it says it will take 20 hours to finish so... I'll try gain when I get home. 
> Why? Why?

Are there any deities you may have angered?

Woop woop Woooop wooooooopppp!!!!

\*Over-energetic mode engages\*

Woooopp woooop woop!!

\*Exceeds the speed of light\*

*Woooooop wooop wuuup woooop!*

**\*Warp mode engages**

1.0 Here I come!

> 
> I think I have a way around. Go to Wayback Machine and go to the site from there.

Oh, Wayback Machine can't even get to it.

The patcher isn't working, it pops up with 2 windows, and the one that says "Hold on we're getting set up" is frozen, and I can't click on the username/password window because it's linked to the "getting set up" window.

I've tried it multiple times, and it hasn't worked any of the times.

The launcher says "checking for updates" and the store, which was working earlier for me, isn't now.

I'm not trying to just complain, I'd like some help.

Thanks in advance,

MRScientist
Hope y'all are having funÃ¢â‚¬Â¦I still got the server migration page

Yay! Downloading ... can't wait to see the new aero

Excellent work Squad, keep at it

> 
> Hope y'all are having funÃ¢â‚¬Â¦I still got the server migration page

Same here. ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)

> 
> Hope y'all are having funÃ¢â‚¬Â¦I still got the server migration page

Me too, and it WAS working.
Apparently the science stuff can only be done externally by a scientist, which I guess makes sense? Doing science mode.
Aaaaand I've already killed Jeb, Bill, Bob and Val.
hmmm, so NASAmission folder in GameData has been merged with Squad now. interesting, logical though (KerbalX is re-adjusting to that now)
As soon as I hit spacebar on the launchpad, I was shocked at first, then I started laughing uncontrollably. The 'Flea' is terrific!
I just updated to 1.0 from 0.90. The update is only 156.2 MB. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

YA HOO!

Awnsers.

I just came back from school (presentations, lots of school stuff). Thanks Squad!

A little late for my birthday (17 days) but who cares ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Thanks for everything.

The store is now working for me, but it still won't patch.

P.S.

I turned off the anti-virus, still no luck.

> 
> Steam is saying update queued ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) any idea when it will start?

Close any other Steam games -> right click, manage downloads ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Steam does not like downloading while playing anything.
I am now downloading the 1.0 installer from the store.
ohmygodohmygodohmygod its downloading
DNS and cache flush worked like a charm, and the download was surprisingly fast. So far, so good!

Hope you have fun, because the hypetrain I am on has not arrived yet. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Embarrassing typo fixed.
in chrome i get server maintenance but in any other browser (which i never use) the website shows up.

> 
> in chrome i get server maintenance but in any other browser (which i never use) the website shows up.

Lucky. I have firefox and safari and it does not work on either.

> 
> in chrome i get server maintenance but in any other browser (which i never use) the website shows up.

Clear your Chrome's cache.
Downloading 1.0 now.... Nice site squad, pretty snazzy.
